comment.author: 39827348@N05
comment._content: That Piper PA-23-250 belongs to Phillips Airlines that was based over in Valparaiso, Indiana. The flew between OHare, Valparaiso, La Porte and Michigan City over in Indiana. You can also see the tail section of a Midstate Airline Meto II with their old "M" logo on the tail. These photo was taken on the old Commuter Terminal Ramp between the old International Terminal One and the Butler Aviation terminal. At the present time, this place is where United Airlines Terminal One Concourses B and C are..
